metadata.description:
122 pages!

The highly acclaimed and Xeric Award-winning series about the murder of a sixteen-year-old boy by four teenagers in the Fishtown section of Philadelphia, PA, originally serialized as a weekly webcomic, is now collected into a deluxe hardcover form. Inspired by real events, Colden's story explores what led the teens to commit such a heinous crime.
metadata.name: Fishtown
